text: Operation Y and Shurik's Other Adventures () is a 1965 Soviet comedy movie directed by Leonid Gaidai.Комедии Гайдая стали наиболее популярными на YouTube-канале "Мосфильма" в дни самоизоляцииОПЕРАЦИЯ "Ы" И ДРУГИЕ ПРИКЛЮЧЕНИЯ ШУРИКА (1965) It stars Aleksandr Demyanenko, Aleksei Smirnov, and Vladimir Basov. ==Actors== *Aleksandr Demyanenko — Shurik *Aleksei Smirnov as Fedya the Boor *Vladimir Basov as The Strict Policeman *Emmanuil Geller as The Passenger with an Umbrella *Rina Zelyonaya as An Old Woman in the bus == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1965 comedy movies Category:1960s family movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Gaidai Category:Movies set in Moscow Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Operation Y and Shurik's Other Adventures
